book.synopsis: A magical fable details the story of how Siamese cats got their dark markings on their faces and tails as Ming Miao tells her kittens the story of their ancestor, Sagwa of China, who tricked the Foolish Magistrate with an ink pot. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 11 Inches, Length: 9.25 Inches, Weight: 0.43 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
